column4: Hi, I have AMD64 ubuntu 8.04 and am having problems watching videos on youtube. what do I need to do? they just don't show up
flashplugin-nonfree is already the newest version.
if you type   about:plugins  in the firefox address box on top and look for Shockwave Flash see if its enabled
I have Shockwave Flash (enabled) and FutureSplash player (enabled)
it used to work on my PC just a few days go. Now anything that is flash just shows up completely blank. Even when I go to the adobe site the flash animation is missing all together
and when you go to youtube nothing shows?
the page loads up with everything except the movie player itself. It's just a big blank white box
never tried swiftfox but i would think it should work
yeah, everything else works fine. And like I said, it was working a few days ago
open Edit>preferences>applications and look for Shockwave Flash file is it set to use Shockwave flash?
this is what it looks like: http://img296.imageshack.us/my.php?image=screenshotxz2.png
edit/prefs/applications - the list is completely empty. nothing in it at all
shouldn't be empty. that is where you assign which programs and plugins to use with which file type
Let me try and uninstall swiftfox and install it again.

I removed and reinstalled swiftfox, same problem - so I just removed swiftfox all together and am using firefox 3 now. The applications list shows up fine and also youtube is working again. thanks for the help
